about_the_game:
Intro:
This is a game fusion of, platform , Puzzle .You will play a small robot through the broken city.

Game play
This game is a linear process. Players need to use jumping, two-way movement, boxes and other props to break down the obstacles on the way. The game is divided into five scenes: the street on the ground floor, buildings, the middle city, factories, and outside the city. New game elements are added in different scenes. You need to pay attention to the eyes of military surveillance robots when walking through buildings. In the factory, you need to be aware of the mechanical mice that are scattered and clustered, The picture of the game has a strong tension. You can enjoy the depressing atmosphere of the end of the world and the weird beauty of Cyberpunk when you play.

StoryLine
The main character is a commercial intelligent robot of the early generation, who once served in the home of a brain neuroscientist and was closely related to his son. At the beginning of the war, he tried to put his nerve into the network to escape in order to save his family's life, but unfortunately he died. The boy's consciousness in the experiment was trapped in the neural network of the home robot by chance. The machine was abandoned and cleared away. Many years later, the robot in the garbage was awakened by unknown signals, and it embarked on the road to find itself

Background story:
This is a story about a small robot. As the first generation of commercial intelligent robot, it once served a brain neuroscientist. At the beginning of the war, in order to save the lives of his family, he tried to transfer his nerve into the network to avoid, but was unfortunately killed. In the experiment, the boy's consciousness remained in the neural network of the domestic robot by chance. The machine was abandoned and cleared. Many years later, the robot in the garbage was awakened by unknown signals. It embarked on the road of finding who he is.

name: Transcendence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Many years later, the robot in the garbage was awakened by unknown signals. It embarked on the road of finding who he is.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
